title: Downtown LA ADJ Studio - Pet-Friendly - Covered Parking - Outdoor BBQ

Union Apartments', '1029 South Union Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90015', 'Call ☏ :', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to HOMEY: ONE, a 31 unit hotel-like residence adjacent to downtown LA.', 'Inspired urban living.', 'Outdoor common space designed for entertaining/working/lounging.', 'Community dining for gatherings.', 'A designated workspace for makers to launch their next product or explore their next hobby.', 'Huge L-shaped Studios are laid out like 1BR units with a separate sleeping area.', 'Flexible lease terms of one year or 6 months.', 'Because as much as HOMEY was created to inspire you while you live here, we also want to inspire you to move on when ready.', '\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200bHOMEY is where next-gen creative professionals live, gather, and create.', 'Covered parking included.', 'Community Amenities', '- Outdoor BBQ', '- Laundry On-Site', '- Controlled Access', '- Covered Parking', '- Outdoor Lounge', '- Dog Run', '- Non-Smoking Community', 'Apartment Amenities', '- Hardwood Flooring', '- Refrigerator', '- Gas Range', '- Dishwasher', 'Pet-Friendly', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Contact Information', 'Viewing or Leasing Information', 'Call ☎:', 'show contact info', 'Visit: <URL>/', 'Location Benefits', '( near 101, 5, 110 & 10 freeway )', "LA Live, Whole Foods, Vons, Food 4 Less, Flavors of Thai, Yardhouse, Monty's Good Burger, Southwestern Law School, FIDM, Golden Gate University, DTLA, Westlake, South Park, Fashion District, Koreatown, University Par"]
